forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain, heavy at times early. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
